name: Self-Forging Hull
desc:
The hulls of Omega ships are able to rapidly self-modify, split and combine to fulfill any needed purpose. Matter itself is but an art form to be shaped and reshaped, made an unmade as Omega desires.

Increases out-of-combat repair rate by %s%%, and %s%% of hull and armor damage is repaired after battle at no cost. Prevents D-mods and ensures ship is always recoverable.
short: Greatly increases repair speed out of combat and repairs some damage after combat immediately at no cost.
